question: my dear friendsI had a question I can't really find an answer for ..I had IDDM since I was 13 months .. without any family history of type 1 or 2 diabetes ....and I want to marry a girl with a family history of type 2 diabetes but she doesn't have it ..what are the possibilities for our children ? and will it differ if everyone of them married a normal person with no family history ?thanx for help
title: IDDM Inheritance
